channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Lally Accelerated Eng/Sci + MBA Program Info Session Scheduled for January 29
item.description: Date: Wednesday, January 29, 2025 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM - Are you interested in saving time and money by getting your MBA in an accelerated program? Register to attend this session to learn more about the new Accelerated Engineering/Science + MBA Program, which allows Rensselaer engineering and science undergraduates to complete their Bachelor’s degree within eight or fewer semesters.
item.author: Students

item.title: Student MHFA Certification Training Concludes January 28
item.description: Date: Tuesday, January 28, 2025 2:00 PM - 5:00 PM - The Mueller Center Campus Recreation and Wellness team will be offering Mental Health First Aid (MHFA) certification trainings for students. If you have any questions about this event, please contact Emma Atkinson in the Mueller Center.
item.author: Students

item.title: 2025 Capital District Mayor’s Cup and Food Drive
item.description: Saturday, January 25 - MVP Arena, Albany. Women’s Game 3 p.m. | Men’s Game 6 p.m. Join us for one of our favorite ice hockey traditions as the Engineers compete for the Capital District Mayor’s Cup against the Union College Garnet Chargers. RPI Community Tickets are $20 and can be purchased in person or over the phone at the RPI Houston Field House box office or at the MVP Arena box office (additional fees may apply).
item.author: Community

item.title: Collegiate Store Offering 20% - 50% Off During Spring Art Sale
item.description: The Rensselaer Collegiate Store is currently hosting its Spring 2025 Art Sale from now through Saturday, June 28, 2025, with sale items available both in-store and online. While supplies last, customers can save 20% off select art supplies, 40% off select brushes, and 50% off paper and canvas! Note that this sale excludes clearance items, art kits, metals, and jewelry, and cannot be combined with other coupons or discounts.
item.author: Community

item.title: Rensselaer Society of Piano Arts to Present Winter Recital
item.description: Date: Saturday, January 25, 2025 7:00 PM - 8:30 PM - Enjoy an evening of music as the Rensselaer Society of Piano Arts performs at the Chapel + Cultural Center, with talented pianists from the RPI student community showcasing their artistry and passion in diverse pieces. Admission is free, and all are welcome!
item.author: Community

item.title: Multimedia Services Announces Increase of Webex Personal Storage Limit
item.description: The personal storage limit for meeting recordings in Webex has increased from 30GB to 40GB for all users of the Webex platform. This limit ensures the optimal performance and availability of Webex to the entire Rensselaer community. Learn more. Any questions, please submit a support request.
item.author: Community

item.title: HR Posts Important Update Regarding Dental Coverage
item.description: As communicated in 2024, Rensselaer’s new dental coverage provider is MetLife as of January 1, 2025. Enrolled faculty and staff should visit the Dental Plans section of the Human Resources website for instructions on how to search for providers, register for a MetLife MyBenefits account online, and access your ID cards.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Fidelity to Offer Confidential In-Person Retirement Consultation February 6
item.description: Date: Thursday, February 6, 2025 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM - Schedule a confidential consultation to become better informed and more confident about your workplace retirement savings plan benefits!
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Reminder: Syllabus will be Published Automatically in HelioCampus January 27
item.description: Just a quick reminder to all faculty to please complete their syllabus in HelioCampu! Based on the requirements from the Provost’s office, faculty should have their syllabi published in HelioCampus by January 20, 2025; HelioCampus will publish all syllabi automatically on January 27, 2025.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: MBA for Professionals Informational Webinar Scheduled for January 30
item.description: Date: Thursday, January 30, 2025 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Register to join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph. D. as he reviews this innovative project-based, online MBA for professionals program. Participants will learn to lead from every aspect of an organization with real-world MBA experience, prepare to lead dynamic and innovative organizations, and engage, involve, motivate, and lead others to reach their fullest potential.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Human Resources Schedules “4 Steps to Effective Communication: Extended DISC” Professional Development Workshop
item.description:
Date: Thursday, February 6, 2025 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM - Our success, both personally and professionally, is largely determined by our ability to communicate effectively with a variety of people. In this workshop, participants will receive individualized Extended DISC reports (based on the completion of the Extended DISC questionnaire) that reflect both their “natural” and “adjusted” behavioral styles and learn strategies which promote successful interactions with others.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
